page.shortlink: api desktop api object class run saved query function

argument.name: query_name
argument.description: Optional. The name of a saved query.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.RUN_SAVED_QUERY() method runs a saved query. If Query_Name is not specified, Alpha Anywhere prompts for a name.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example displays the Select Query dialog box.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Invoice") ptr.Run_Saved_Query()
